The print command

What does this program output?

print "hi print hi"

Choose one correct answer:

hi

print hi

print hi

hi print hi

The print command

Which program generates the following text output?

print hi

Choose two correct answers:

print "hi"

print "print hi"

print "print" "hi"

print "hi print hi"

The print command

What does this program output?

print "hi"

Choose one correct answer:

"hey"
ho
hi
"hi"

move 50 50
color "red"
